name: Snow Leopard Vestige
description: Snow Leopard Vestiges are used at the Trophy Bench to create a Snow Leopard Trophy , which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary . They are also used at the Advanced Textiles Bench / Electric Textiles Bench to make Snow Leopard Rugs . Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of the Well Rested Buff .
